headline: AMAT Climbs 8% in a Month: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: Applied Materials shares jump 7.6% in a month as strength in wafer fab tools, advanced packaging and AI-driven demand supports its long-term growth case.

raw.headline: AMAT Climbs 8% in a Month: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?

headline: NVTS Trades at Premium Valuation: Should You Hold or Fold the Stock?
summary: Navitas Semiconductor trades at a steep valuation as its pivot to high-power AI markets shows promise, but near-term revenue pressure tempers optimism.

headline: Lam Research Stock's High P/E: Justified Premium or Too Pricey to Buy?
summary: LRCX trades at a 38.14 forward P/E after a 175% rally, but AI-driven demand, strong margins and $5B-plus quarters fuel confidence in its growth.

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Broadcom, Lam Research and Amkor
summary: Broadcom, Lam Research and Amkor stand out as AI demand, advanced packaging and hyperscaler spending fuel semiconductor growth.
